root.title: U 179 (TM 334) 408
root.general: The top right part of the manuscript page. The right field (1.1 cm) is partially kept. Probably this fragment makes one manuscript with U5 (Wilkens, №22) and with U172 (Wilkens, №585).
root.description: Manuscript: Old Turkic, slightly water damaged. Paper: rough, light-beige. Quantity of lines: 5 lines in each and one line of heading in A and B. Designations: A: in the middle of a right edge: ТМ 334 (pencil); on the left top corner the old sticker [T]M 334; in the right top corner the sticker U 179. Characteristics: colon marks are outlined in red; A: florets are blue, heading is tan; B: florets are red with blue center, heading is blue.
root.size: Distance between lines: 1.1 cm. 6.5 cm (height) x 9.4 cm (width).
root.investigation: Sertkaya 424 conducted researches.
root.details: Depositum der BERLIN-BRANDENBURGISCHEN AKADEMIE DER WISSENSCHAFTEN in der STAATSBIBLIOTHEK ZU BERLIN - Preussischer Kulturbesitz. Orientabteilung.
